note.p: German agriculturalist and civil servant. Studied agriculture, Royal Agricultural Academy, Poppelsdorf (Bonn); lecturer, 1865. Professor of agriculture, Darmstadt polytechnic, 1869; Munich polytechnical high school, 1872. General secretary, Prussian council on agriculture, 1873. Trustee of the agricultural high school, Berlin, 1881. Official in the Prussian ministry of agriculture and forests, 1885.
Faculty of agriculture and horticulture, Humboldt University, Berlin, http://www.agrar.hu-berlin.de/profil/geschichte/geschichte/personen_html/ (accessed 10 December 2008).

note.term: works on agriculture and land economy
